item.description:
Last Day for Promo Code disscount. "redsox12"

Take the Boston TV and Movie Bus Tour at 10:45 am on Sunday, May 6 starting at the Boston Common Visitors Center. It lasts about 3 hours and ends at Cheers.

See where the chase scene from the Town took place.

Grab a drink at the L Street Tavern, home of Good Will Hunting.

Find out more abour several scenes from Fever Pitch and Fenway Park. 

Visit 10 locations from The Departed including the building from the climatic roof top scene.

Catch a glimpse of the buildings used in Ally McBeal and Boston Legal.

Get insider information on the secrets behind filming the Mystic River, Legally Blonde, Fever Pitch, 21, Gone Baby Gone and Blown Away.

Lucy from On Location Tours at www.screentours.com has reserved a block of tickets for the Sunday, May 6 tour. Tickets are $40.00. Enter Promo code "redsox12" for a 10% discount. This offer ends 5 days before the tour on May 1.

Tickets may be purchased at http://www.screentours.com

A couple of us Natives took the tour and had fun!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet The Tour Guide Outside the Visitors Center
item.name: Boston TV & Movie Sites Bus Tour thru Boston
